name: SQR🔲 2
description:
SQR 2 is a colourful mathematical puzzle. The player's point is to make each line's digit sum equal to appropriate column's sum using addition (+), substraction (-), multiplication (×) and division (÷) operation only.

- 6 levels of complexity (up to 7x7)
- a fascinating intellectual process to train your brains!
- 18 levels tutorial
- unlimited levels to play
- minimal price
- Steam achievements
- pleasant music

As soon as possible:
- trading cards

Develop mathematical thinking playing SQR 2!
